alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 25 at 5:13AM PST until December 25 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...The valleys of Central Douglas County, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County, and Jackson County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow for plenty of room between you and other vehicles. * Fog makes objects appear farther away than they are * Use low beams. High beams reflect back thick fog, making visibility worse for you and other drivers. * Be prepared. Keep your headlights clean. That way, you`re ready for low-visibility conditions * Don`t use cruise control. Most crashes occur because the driver is going too fast for weather conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
